description:
As a registered donor
  I want to book donation slots at blood banks
  So that I can donate blood at my convenient time

steps.name: I am logged in as a donor user with email "jeevan@gmail.com"

result.error_message:

steps.name: I am on the donor dashboard
I select blood bank "City Blood Bank"
I select time slot "10:00 AM - 11:00 AM"
I should see "Slot booked successfully" message
I should receive a booking confirmation with QR code
I should get booking reference number
the slot should show as "Booked" status
